name: tchp-demo-data
title: TCHP Demo Data
description: Metadata and data derived from TCHP Demo. CollectionBuilder-CONTENTdm is a template for creating digital collection exhibits on top of existing CONTENTdm repositories. This demo features materials from the Frank B. Robinson Papers documenting Psychiana, a religion popular in the 1930s and 40s.
